name: newTest
description: 1. `npm run generate-server` for the grpc server stubs  2. `npm run generate-grpcClient` for the grpc client stubs 2. `make build-linux` for the docker container in the compose step 3. `docker-compose up --build` 4. Navigate to `localhost:8000`

scripts.start: npm run build:proto && tsc && concurrently --kill-others "go run go/exampleserver/exampleserver.go" "npm run webpack-dev"
